node.name: Xcarecrows 4 MDI
node.shortdescription:
The Xcarecrows 4 MDI Eclipse plugin provides a complete toolset to build elaborate applications and systems models from graphical UML diagrams. It couples with Rational Software Modeler by IBM to design MDA applications and generate executable code directly from the UML modeling tool.

Features

  • an UML profile to work with Rational Software Modeler by IBM
  • a clear insulation of control logic and operations on data
  • a graphical editor whose viewpoint focuses on the behavior of the modeled system
  • a code-generating model
  • a seamless interfacing with existing applications

Packaging

  • Windows and Linux support (platform neutral Java)
  • Free online updates
  • Installation guide
  • User documentation
  • Sample tutorial code

Licensing
Xcarecrows 4 MDI is built on top of ">http://www.eclipseplugincentral.com/Web_Links-index-req-viewlink-cid-105... Xcarecrows 4 MDA. Both plugins are available under the Open Source Apache">http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0">Apache License version 2.

Changes from version 1.2.19

  • Dependencies have been updated to version 1.2.10 of Xcarecrows4MDA
  • Documentation appears in its own plugin
node.body:
The Xcarecrows 4 MDI Eclipse plugin provides a complete toolset to build elaborate applications and systems models from graphical UML diagrams. It couples with Rational Software Modeler by IBM to design MDA applications and generate executable code directly from the UML modeling tool.

Features

  • an UML profile to work with Rational Software Modeler by IBM
  • a clear insulation of control logic and operations on data
  • a graphical editor whose viewpoint focuses on the behavior of the modeled system
  • a code-generating model
  • a seamless interfacing with existing applications

Packaging

  • Windows and Linux support (platform neutral Java)
  • Free online updates
  • Installation guide
  • User documentation
  • Sample tutorial code

Xcarecrows 4 MDI is built on top of ">http://www.eclipseplugincentral.com/Web_Links-index-req-viewlink-cid-105... Xcarecrows 4 MDA. Both plugins are available under the Open Source Apache">http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0">Apache License version 2.
